import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { InfoContext } from "../Context/InfoProvider"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function MyProfile() { const { Account } = useContext(InfoContext); const handleOnUpdate = () => { console.log("Profile Updated"); }; return ( <>
